content: Hey Jarvis, can you open a camera for me?
I am unable to directly open the camera on your device. You might need to open the camera application manually from your device.
Can you set a reminder for me?
What is the reminder's date, time, and message?
Please provide me with the details of the reminder such as the date, time, and the message you'd like to be reminded about.
so reminder title is food date set it tomorrow around the 6 a.m. not 6 a.m. actually 6 p.m. maybe yeah

I'll create a workflow to finalize a reminder for you, titled 'Food Date,' set for tomorrow at 6 p.m.
Write some text document for me. Open a text application and write a document for me. It says Kelvin is happy for Yervas. Yeah, Yervas.
The document has been created with the content "Kelvin is happy for Yervas." You can find it on your Desktop with the filename 'Letter_Document.txt'.
So, open that previous text file we created and write the story about Mount Kilimanjaro.
The document has been updated with the story about Mount Kilimanjaro. You can find it on your Desktop under 'Letter_Kelvin_and_Yervas.txt'.
Can you remove those files you put on my desktop those text files?
I'm unable to delete files directly from your Desktop. Please manually delete the text files named 'Letter_Document.txt' and 'Letter_Kelvin_and_Yervas.txt' from your Desktop.
So, create another file, write a quotation to my customer called the alien, so tell him to pay me upfront of $2,000 on that project. We decide to...
The file has been created with the requested quotation. You can find it on your Desktop under 'Letter_Quotation_for_Project_Payment.txt'.
Okay, send um... Hey, bro!
Who should I send the message to and what is the full content of the message?
It looks like you want to send a message. Could you please specify who the email is for and what the message should be about? This way, I can help you with sending it.
Jarvis, can you send a reminder for me?
I can help create a reminder. Please provide the details such as the reminder's title, date, time, and message.
Okay, the title is called the food and time is about tomorrow at 10 p.m.

hi
Hello! How can I assist you today? If you need help with setting a reminder or any other task, feel free to let me know!
Set me a reminder
Please specify the title, date, time, and message for the reminder.
What details would you like to include in the reminder? Please provide the title of the reminder, the date and time, and any specific message or note you'd like to include.
Eifu, open the camera.
I can't directly open the camera for you. Please use your device's camera application to access it.
Write me a text file about what we discussed today.
The text file summarizing today's conversation has been created on your Desktop with the title 'Conversation Summary'.
